name: TurboCrypt
short_description:
TurboCrypt is a new very fast Public Key Infrastructure and cryptographic library using a newly developed lattice based encryption / signature algorithm.
Also included are all standard cryptographic functions (hash, symmetric encryption , secure RND, ...
